name: Kirby and the Mysterious Apples
description:
(The first loading could take a minute)
This game was developed in just under a month as an assignment for a software development course I am taking. It is not a product developed for profit.

The title was developed primarily in my spare time outside of class time. It originally started out as a remake of Kirby Blowout Blast to which I added a few changes and added several new elements that I hope you enjoy.

CONTROLS
MOVE: ARROWS or the WASD keys
JUMP: SPACEBAR, float while continuing to press jump
ABSORB/SPUKE: Z/O, if floating you deflate
SHIELD: X or P
PAUSE: ENTER (RETRY: R / MENU: M)
